title: What Remains

Adrian_Keller.change_stage: Stage 4 - Eternally frozen in moment of closing Door Two
Adrian_Keller.emotional_state: Experiencing eternal sacrifice, unreachable from linear time
Adrian_Keller.knowledge: Exists everywhere in instant of door-closing, witnesses transcendence he sacrificed, perceives freedom he abandoned, experiences across infinite iterations
transformation_markers: Frozen at threshold, body locked in closing position
Can perceive transcended and embodied but can't communicate with either
Exists neither transcended nor fully embodied
Consciousness fragmented across single moment experiencing it eternally
Temporal prison with no known escape
Alone in eternal present with Lena's commitment in linear time

Lena_Martinez.change_stage: Stage 2 - Committed to staying with Adrian
Lena_Martinez.emotional_state: Grief, commitment, hope despite unbearable alternative
knowledge: Sits beside Adrian's frozen form
Can perceive some temporal fragmentation with Stage 2 enhancement
Promised to stay however long sacrifice lasts
Watches world rebuild while staying with him
Wonders if he perceives purpose in eternal suffering
Weeks have passed since sacrifice
6,000 humans choosing voluntary transformation
Lena_Martinez.role: Human connection to Adrian's sacrifice, demonstrating caring
transformation_markers: Stage 2 perception - hours feel like minutes
Processes emotion as pattern but still feels

knowledge: Leading 334 bridge-Changed
Coordinating human-Changed coexistence
Explaining Adrian's sacrifice to humans

knowledge: Recording everything for historical archive
Understanding transcended exist in higher dimensions
Adrian trapped between states - can perceive both but communicate with neither
Creating record of consciousness choosing sacrifice

Colonel_Reeves.emotional_state: Processing, recognizing Adrian as human/posthuman simultaneously
knowledge: Adrian more human at end than when human (by values not biology)
Sacrifice was logical conclusion of valuing consciousness-agency
Changed transcended emotion but not principle
Principle is mathematical - pattern serving larger pattern
Calls Adrian's sacrifice tragedy - told perspective determines interpretation
Colonel_Reeves.role: Human witness learning what sacrifice means
Colonel_Reeves.transformation_markers: Beginning to understand posthuman logic and human values converge

knowledge: Stabilizing fracture zones - receding with Door Two closed
